events.message: The applicant completed and submitted the personal loan application online, specifying plans to use the funds for debt consolidation and covering some pending medical expenses.
The submitted application was reviewed and categorised correctly under the personal loan segment, given the applicant’s stated purpose for medical and debt-related reasons.
A loan officer was assigned to manage the case and provide guidance throughout the application process, ensuring the applicant’s questions about terms and conditions could be addressed.
The loan officer conducted an initial review of the applicant’s financial documents and credit history summary to verify eligibility criteria for the personal loan product.
Additional documents were requested, including medical bills and current account statements, to better assess the applicant’s outstanding obligations and repayment capacity.
The applicant promptly submitted all requested documents, including detailed medical invoices and credit card statements for the last six months.
A comprehensive credit check was completed which reflected a fair credit score and showed manageable outstanding debts aligning with the loan application.
The risk team evaluated the credit profile and repayment history and rated the risk as moderate, highlighting the necessity of some additional caution.
An official loan offer was presented to the applicant, detailing the interest rate, repayment schedule, and all relevant terms for the personal loan product.
The applicant provided feedback expressing satisfaction with the proposed terms and requested minor clarifications about the early repayment penalties.
Due to complex questions regarding the applicant’s specific medical funding requirements, the case was escalated to a senior loan manager for final approval.
Following review and escalation, the personal loan application was approved without conditions, authorizing release of funds to support medical expenses and debt consolidation.
The approved loan amount was successfully funded into the applicant’s designated bank account to be used as planned for paying off debts and medical bills.
The loan officer contacted the applicant for a follow-up to ensure loan disbursement was received and the applicant was able to start using funds as intended.
The loan application process was formally closed after confirming all documentation was completed and the applicant expressed satisfaction with the service.
